story.title: ‚ú® Ambience & History
paragraphs: Riad Dar Tiflet is a truly traditional Berber home, nestled in the vibrant heart of Marrakech‚Äôs medina. Once the family house of a Berber grocer, this century-old riad has preserved the authenticity of its architecture and the soul of its past.

Handmade zellij tiles, carved plaster, hand-decorated floors and walls‚Ä¶ every detail bears witness to ancestral craftsmanship. Locally made furniture and rugs carry on this living heritage, faithful to the simple, warm aesthetics of Berber culture.
heritage: The name Dar Tiflet is a nod to this dual identity:
A direct tribute to its roots, and the idea of a place that is open, intimate, and deeply grounded.

highlights.title: Today
highlights.body: A bridge between past and present ‚Äî every corner whispers a story. This is a lived-in space, not just a decorated one.

highlights.title: Sunny terrace
highlights.body: Overlooks medina rooftops ‚Äî a space to share and unwind.

paragraphs: At Dar Tiflet, you are welcomed like friends. Berber hospitality shows in a mint tea, a sincere smile, and care for the smallest details.
Dar Tiflet is an invitation to experience Marrakech differently: at the pace of its people, at the heart of its traditions, and in a house where every stone tells a story.
